main event: An unidentified object resembling a star was sighted in Bel Air, Maryland on December 13, 1957.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a blinking light and predominantly yellow color, changing to green or white,It was observed through binoculars, showing a halo effect not visible to the naked eye,The sighting lasted approximately 3.1 hours,The object sometimes appeared circular or disk-shaped,The witness had been observing these objects for several months prior to this report.
